read GEO datasets summary .txt file

Source: R/read-info.R
read_summary.Rd

refer to here for how to get the input file

read_summary(path)

Arguments

path

string. path to the summary .txt file

Value

tibble

  1. accession

  2. type

  3. species

  4. ftp

  5. platform

  6. data_type

  7. title

  8. description

Examples

read_summary(system.file('extdata/gds_result-cut.txt', package = 'rGEO.data'))
#> # A tibble: 4 x 8
#>   accession type    species      ftp    platform  data_type title description  
#>   <chr>     <chr>   <chr>        <chr>  <chr>     <chr>     <chr> <chr>        
#> 1 GDS6177   DataSet Homo sapiens ftp:/… Platform… "\tExpre… Acut… Analysis of …
#> 2 GDS5804   DataSet Homo sapiens ftp:/… Platform… "\tExpre… PI3K… Analysis of …
#> 3 GSE18816  Series  Homo sapiens ftp:/… Dataset:… "\tExpre… Expr… (Submitter s…
#> 4 GSE3      Series  Homo sapiens ftp:/… Platform… "\tExpre… Rena… (Submitter s…
